title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Colle dell’Assietta, Italy
content:
Photo submitted by Gianfranco Ciaravola, “Colle dell’Assietta, unpaved ex-military road in Italian north West Alps; theatre of fight between French and Italian army in 18th century. All above 2000 meter on sea level.” We always love seeing photos from where you are riding and are happy to share them with our readers around the world here

The post Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Colle dell’Assietta, Italy appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Kristi Benedict
